link.script:

");}).call(this);

h1.div: Per The Governor, Schools Will Remain Closed Through The End Of This School Year.

span.a: Educational Resources for Students and Families

span.a: A Message to All Citizens from Haven for Hunger

div.jsaction: click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue; focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;

span.style: font-family: Lora; font-size: 20px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

div.span: The Everett Grace Food Pantry at 50 Church Street in Everett is opening up their doors to all in need. No city restrictions. They are open from 10am - 12pm on Friday.

h3.div: Teachers, families, and students should reach out to the 21st Century Learning Department HERE if they need help with Aspen, Google Accounts (password resets, student access to devices and email), Google Classroom, and Google meet.

h3.div: On Monday the 23rd, there will be a "Grab and Go" from 1:00 to 3:00 at each school for students receiving free and reduced lunch.
The following links contain revised Learning Plans from the Higgins and Elementary Principals.

div.jsaction: click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue; focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;

span.style: font-family: Lora; font-size: 20px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

div.span: Encore Boston Harbor made a donation of about 18,000 pounds of food that can feed many families!

h3.div: Please see the Technology Support section of this site for information regarding Comcast's Internet Essentials program.
Message to staff: All Peabody Public Schools buildings have been cleaned and therefore are CLOSED for staff access with the exception of cafeterias for food pickup.

div.jsaction: click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue; focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;

h3.div: All Kindergarten Registration Are Postponed Until Further Notice

The Superintendent Finalists Public Interviews Will Go Forward As Planned This Evening (March 16). Peabody Residents May Watch The Interviews Live On Peabody TV Channel 8, Or Peabody TV’s Youtube And Facebook Pages
